game.beginning: The world of Eridoria is at peace, with the return of the sun and the end of a centuries-long darkness.
game.ending: The fate of the world hangs in the balance as the last remnants of the ancient civilization fight against an unknown threat.
game.synopsis:
You play as a member of the Council of Sages, tasked with uncovering the truth behind a series of mysterious events that are unraveling the fabric of time and space. As you delve deeper into the heart of Eridoria, you discover that an ancient evil is stirring from its slumber, threatening to plunge the world back into darkness.

Your journey takes you through forgotten ruins, hidden temples, and long-abandoned cities, where you'll encounter strange creatures, rival treasure hunters, and enigmatic allies who will aid or hinder your progress. Along the way, you'll uncover ancient artifacts, decode cryptic messages, and unravel the mysteries of Eridoria's past.

With each step closer to the truth, you'll be forced to confront the dark secrets of your own past and the true nature of your destiny. Will you find a way to stop the impending doom, or will the world succumb to the forces of darkness? The fate of Eridoria rests in your hands.
game.title: Timekeepers of Eridoria
